body.name: GZGYNADAST 80mm Portable Receipt Printer,Bluetooth Mobile POS Direct Thermal Printer with Bluetooth+USB,3 inch Ticket Wireless iOS Android Bill Invoice Printer for Small Business
features: 【with free U disk 】package include free U disk(driver, SDK ,VIDEO,USING MANUAL are in U disk), No need of toner, ink, ribbon.just need thermal paper. Note!! Before turning on the printer, please remove the battery and tear off the insulating glue on back of battery, insulating glue sticker let battery can't work. before connect bluetooth in APP, please remember to open position and bluetooth of mobile phone in setting,in APP to connect bluetooth, not in mobile phone's setting to connect bluetooth.

【Printing With Bluetooth】 MAX paper Diameter is 50MM ,It's compatible with WINDOWS 7 8 10 11 XP 2000 ,ios and android device by bluetooth,it's not compatible with MAC OS.Printer built-in Bluetooth 4.0 and 7.2V 1800mAH large capacity lithium battery for thermal printer, supports Android/IOS Devices. The maximum printing width is 72mm, the maximum roll diameter is 50mm, can be used the 80*50mm thermal receipt paper. 80mm portable receipt printer, Mobile POS Direct Thermal Printer with Bluetooth+USB,3 inch Ticket wireless ios android bill invoice express printer for small business
【APP for Android system】Mobile thermal printer supports Loyverse, iREAP, CasierStock, Kyte, Pozool, ExpressExpense, Cash sale POS, O3POS, Kasse Speedy for Android devices only.

【APP for IOS 】THIS Printer Only Support "Express Thermal Print", "MYXPrint" and "MHTreceipt" for iOS devices like iPad, iPhones. ***DO NOT Support Square, Gloriafood, Doordash, Grubhub, TabShop lite, Clover, Open Table, O3POS, MobiPOS Lite, and Kasse Speedy/PayPal/Intuit Gopayment/Shopify/Credit Card Reader/settle/FileMaker. Please confirm with us if before order.

[How to connect bluetooth ] 1, peel off insulation paste on battery,insulation paste let battery can't work, then turn on printer 2, download APP and open App on your mobile phone 3, open mobile phone's bluetooth and location in setting,but don't connect bluetooth in mobile phone's bluetooth, to connect bluetooth in APP, in APP search bluetooth name of printer and connect it, printer 's blueototh name is on self-test page

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to connect bluetooth? 1, peel off insulation paste on battery, turn on printer 2, download APP 3, open mobile phone's bluetooth and location in setting,but don't connect bluetooth in mobile phone, to connect bluetooth in APP, in APP search bluetooth name connect it which APP could be support for android mobile phone? Mobile thermal printer supports Loyverse, iREAP, CasierStock, Kyte, Pozool, ExpressExpense, Cash sale POS, O3POS, Kasse Speedy for Android devices only. which APP is compatible with IOS mobile phone/ipad? THIS Printer Only Support "Express Thermal Print", "MYXPrint" and "MHTreceipt" for iOS devices like iPad, iPhones. can't support which APP? DO NOT Support Square, Gloriafood, Doordash, Grubhub, TabShop lite, Clover, Open Table, O3POS, MobiPOS Lite, and Kasse Speedy/PayPal/Intuit Gopayment/Shopify/Credit Card Reader/settle/FileMaker. Please confirm with us if before order. Where is Driver for printer? package include free U disk(driver, SDK ,VIDEO,USING MANUAL are in U disk)
NO ribbon,NO Cingula,NO PGBK,high quality NO ribbon,NO Cingula,NO PGBK NO ribbon,NO Cingula,NO PGBK,JUST Need thermal receipt paper High quality Shockproof, Pressure defense,waterproof
printing width max 80mm printing width max 80mm printing width max 80mm
widely used support 1D barcode and QR code

Without carbon ink Note： can't find bluetooth of printer in phone's setting ,can't connect bluetooth in setting,only can connect bluetooth in our app no ribbon/ink/cingula/PGBK just need thermal paper, thermal printing tecnology widely used 1. Print mode: thermal type 2. Print width: 80mm 3. Print density: 384 dot / line 4. Print speed: 50-90mm/s 5. Interface: USB+ Bluetooth 6. Print paper width: 80mm 7. Roll diameter: 40 mm 8. Paper thickness: 0.06-0.08mm 9. Print command: compatible with ESC/POS
